name: SHEEPS
description:
Alone or with a friend, try to survive while keeping as many sheeps alive as possible! Discover all sheep types and unleash their powers to fight evil hordes of enemies through 10 levels or go beyond the limits in the infinite mode! 

Controls :

  •  Use WASD or the arrow keys to move (in multiplayer one moves with WASD and the other with the arrow keys).
  • Press P to pause.
  •  After a level press R to restart.

If you experience some performance issues I highly recommend you download the game.

Note : This game was originally an entry to the MiniJam 52 that I kept working on. You can find the old jam entry on my page.
